{"step_by_step_thinking": "COVID-19 and other respiratory illnesses like influenza have overlapping symptoms such as fever, cough, and difficulty breathing. However, there are some symptoms like loss of taste and smell that are more specific to COVID-19. Despite these differences, it is not possible to definitively distinguish between COVID-19 and other respiratory illnesses based solely on clinical symptoms. A diagnostic test is required to confirm COVID-19.", "answer_choice": "B"}
